Name: Teahouse Folding Screen: Hidden Heart of Gold
Desc: A tall and narrow folding screen that may be found within Komore Teahouse.\nThis screen's color coding is exactly the same as that of an age-old sweet tea. The tea leaves that have yet to touch water seem withered and brown, but the brewed tea has a golden color. A profound meaning lies underneath this matter, which is that even people who seem unruly and unkempt may yet be as valuable as gold.
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
